for _ in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n=int(raw_input())
    li=map(int, raw_input().split())
    dic={}
    for i in li:
        if i in dic:
            dic[i]+=1
        else:
            dic[i]=1
    li=list(set(li))
    li.sort()
    ans=[li[0], dic[li[0]]]
    for i in li:
        if dic[i]>ans[1]:
            ans=[i, dic[i]]
    print ans[0], ans[1]
